results.name: cardiffmet
results.text: Work placements while studying Software Engineering at Cardiff Met led to a career with computing household name IBM for Cameron: https://t.co/bWvPi6jhnt https://t.co/TG4lFpitWg

results.name: PlymUni
results.text: Our scientists have also worked with @IBM to develop cutting edge #Hypertaste sensors that will provide real-time assessments of the major ions present in sea water at various locations. https://t.co/6ikBDAkMec

results.name: bournemouthuni
results.text: From placements at the Walt Disney Company, IBM & NHS Professionals to students contributing to fundraising, growing social media followings, new clients & revenue - BU's Business School students had a lot to celebrate at the 2021 Employability Awards. https://t.co/KyhYsPNuNM https://t.co/E9dNU0liBu

results.name: UniOfHull
results.text:
Computer Science students starting in September are guaranteed a paid year in industry. 💰

Students have previously worked at the likes of Microsoft, IBM and BT. 🖥️

They will spend 3 months at @Lampada_DS, before heading on to other companies.

More 👇

https://t.co/3k65OPpe6h

results.name: SUAlums
results.text:
🍊This week in The Slice🍊
https://t.co/MSLUEOlxop
➤ "We made it" 
➤ Familiar, famous name to lead @CuseMLAX 
➤ A 'Cuse Conversation with @CWilliamson44 that doesn't "stick to sports" 
➤ Five questions with @IBM Sr. VP @rwlord '85 https://t.co/0FbTU69BU3

results.name: RoehamptonUni
results.text:
📝5 ways to make the most of your placement year📝

We spoke to Rafa, a third year BSc Human Resource Management student who completed a one-year placement at IBM, on his top tips to make the most of the opportunity of a placement year.

Read more: https://t.co/q6Wz2uq0Du

results.name: iSchoolSU
results.text: Bobbi Whitney '21 talks about her experience as a RA, Peer Advisor, and Syracuse Scholar Winner, and how she landed her dream job at IBM https://t.co/wiMj0amt7y

results.name: CGIU
results.text: We're excited to welcome them into the CGI U Class of 2022 and collaborate with them and IBM’s @CallforCode to develop their project in the months ahead.

results.name: CGIU
results.text: Feeling inspired by the @IBM @CallforCode @BlackGirlsCode winning team and their idea to help save the planet. Tomorrow @ChelseaClinton will meet with the Tech Divas to hear more about their winning solution and celebrate #GirlPower #TechForGood 👩‍💻 https://t.co/JY3ZbByhqi

results.name: unisouthampton
RoehamptonUni
results.text:
#ICYMI: We spoke to Rafa, a third year BSc Human Resource Management student who completed a one-year placement at IBM, about his top tips to make the most of the opportunity of a placement year.

https://t.co/e1c946DbSw

results.name: oxford_brookes
results.text: From tackling poverty to evaluating cancer treatments. Join us on 5 July to hear from Dr Kush R. Varshney, who will be speaking about the past 5 years of progress in Tech for Good initiatives at IBM. https://t.co/4MuwhY3hlz

results.name: SUNY
results.text: A partnership between @ualbany and @IBM is growing, and it will bring more #SUNYResearch into the correlation between climate change and weather impacts. Learn more about what's to come in this @WAMCRadio conversation: https://t.co/mt85nsg4T1

results.name: _UoW
results.text:
Read Louisa’s blog on studying as a degree apprentice whilst working at IBM.
“Apprenticeships exist in all forms & you’ll meet some great people along the way.”
👉 https://t.co/MXQuyaHPoq

results.name: UCBofficial
results.text:
It's excellent to have Ian Gardner from @IBM at McIntyre House today! 

Our students enjoyed a masterclass about AI and machine learning, finding out some crucial information about the IBM Food Sustainability Project and how smart sensors and data can help cut food waste. https://t.co/myzb9CdBsv

results.name: ThinkUHI
results.text:
Interested in a career in #SoftwareDevelopment? Our BSc (Hons) Applied Software Development degree is delivered mainly online working with students all around the UK using tools provided by #IBM. Now’s The Time to apply for September 2021: https://t.co/akkzipCg2w 

#ThinkUHI https://t.co/KYH5HL5HgI

results.name: CGIU
results.text: Join us and our partners at @IBM tomorrow at 7:00pm ET to hear from the winners of the #CallforCode Education Innovation Case Competition! Tune in to the Awards Ceremony at: https://t.co/0HaT6f9LQv https://t.co/EqHsaourNS

results.name: CUNY
results.text: Find out how @CityTechNews is helping high school students access community college courses through a program created by the president of the @IBM Foundation. https://t.co/avmY0HwQ5R https://t.co/yeI22dHYb5

results.name: imperialcollege
results.text: #OnThisDay 1964: The IBM System/360 mainframe computer system family was announced https://t.co/OFV4Q80N9v

results.name: OxfordPhysics
results.text: Quantum physics @maria__violaris, DPhil student at @UniofOxford, is creating a video series about #quantum paradoxes using @qiskit with @IBM Quantum. Her 1st video is about playing a game of quantum #minesweeper based on the quantum bomb paradox, watch ▶️ https://t.co/O9Bmmj2yQk https://t.co/5cQY45Szye

results.name: UniOfHull
results.text:
Students have previously worked at industry giants like IBM, Microsoft and BT but wherever you end up, you’ll be paid a salary during your year in industry.

Our placement team set up everything, plus they'll stay in touch throughout the year to give you any support you need.

results.name: WidenerUniv
results.text:
An international biz major & poli sci minor, his résumé includes experiences w/ @IBM, @GoldmanSachs & interning with @RepMGS

"Widener has done a really good job preparing me for what hands-on work was going to look like, how I can use my major, and what options I have." —Brandon
